channel.title: Nulling prayers?
channel.description:
hey guys i found this perfect old school client for my cammy pvp server and there is 1 problem to it. when you click on the prayers that go above your head i dont know why but the client just freezes and lags out. here is my error
RS2 user client - release #317 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method34(client.java:1344) at client.method146(client.java:11922) at client.method102(client.java:7785) at client.method9(client.java:8658) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4467) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Nulling prayers?
item.dc:creator: @Pro4Show Pro4Show
item.description:
@Pro4Show wrote:

hey guys i found this perfect old school client for my cammy pvp server and there is 1 problem to it. when you click on the prayers that go above your head i dont know why but the client just freezes and lags out. here is my error

Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.NullPointerException
